server-is-busy: Server is busy. Please try again later
you-do-not-have-permission-to-access-thi: You do not have permission to access this feature
invalid-access-token: Incorrect authentication information please log in again
validation-errors: Some of the fields you entered are invalid. Please try again
failed-to-register-user: User registration failed. Please try again later
registered-successfully: User registration successful. Please login to continue.
the-path-you-are-trying-to-access-is-inv: The path you are trying to access is invalid
error-uploading-file: Error uploading file, please try another file
invalid-image-type: Invalid image type, only JPG, PNG, GIF files are supported
file-too-large: File too large, only supports files under 5mb in size
new-password-same-as-old-password: You cannot set a new password that is the same as the old password
change-password-successfully: Password changed successfully, please log in again to continue
account-is-disabled: Your account has been disabled! Please contact the administrator for more details
file-type-not-supported: File type not supported! Please choose again.
document-already-linked: Document is already linked to another project
only-project-manager-can-link-repo: Only project manager can link repository
previous-phase-not-completed: Previous phase is not completed yet
deadline-before-previous-phase: Deadline is before previous phase deadline
confirm-cancel-phase-message: This may affect workflow and reporting. Are you sure you want to change the status to CANCELED?
deadline-after-phase-deadline: Deadline cannot be after phase deadline
deadline-after-project-deadline: Deadline cannot be after project deadline
confirm-cancel-project-message: Are you sure you want to cancel this project? This action will mark the whole project as canceled.
project-deadline-conflict: Cannot update project deadline. Some phases or tasks have deadlines after the selected date.
deadline-cannot-be-in-the-past: Deadline cannot be in the past
cannot-set-planning-when-has-tasks: Cannot set Planning when project already has tasks.
cannot-complete-project-while-some-tasks: Cannot complete project while some tasks are not completed.
confirm-cancel-task-message: This may affect workflow and reporting. Are you sure you want to change the task status to CANCELED?
confirm-delete-evidence-message: This action will permanently delete the selected proof file. Are you sure?
confirm-clear-evidence-message: This action will permanently delete all proof files of this task. Are you sure?
